message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'll take the lead, Alice! You can't beat this offer!
You said I couldn't beat this offer? Let's see about that, Bob!
You're getting desperate, Alice! My offer is still better than yours!
You think I'm desperate? I'm just being smart! Your offers are getting old, Bob.
I'm not giving up yet, Alice! Let's meet in the middle!
Meeting in the middle? That's not good enough, Bob. I'm willing to take a bit more risk for a bigger reward.
I'm not going to give up yet, Alice! I'll take a slightly smaller share to keep the game going!
